install!() click to toggle source 
    # File installer.rb, line 71
71:     def install!
72:       begin
73:         write_message "** Installing dojo source into your application..."
74:         install_dojo_source
75:       rescue Exception => e
76:         die_with_message("!! Could not install dojo sources: #{e.to_s}")
77:       end
78: 
79:       begin
80:         write_message "** Installing drails javascripts into your application..."
81:         install_drails_scripts
82:       rescue Exception => e
83:         die_with_message("!! Could not install drails javascripts: #{e.to_s}")
84:       end
85: 
86:       write_message(install_success_msg)
87:     end
install_dojo_source() click to toggle source 
    # File installer.rb, line 94
94:     def install_dojo_source
95:       cmd = Dojo::Commands::Dojofy.new
96:       Dir.chdir(rails_root) do
97:         cmd.install
98:       end
99:     end
install_drails_scripts() click to toggle source 
     # File installer.rb, line 101
101:     def install_drails_scripts
102:       cp_r drails_scripts_dir, dojo_dest_dir
103:     end
install_success_msg() click to toggle source 
    # File installer.rb, line 47
47:     def install_success_msg
48:       msg =** drails was installed successfully!** drails installed dojo source and drails scripts to:****    #{dojo_dest_dir}**** All other drails source files are located at:****    #{drails_root}**
49:     end

     # File installer.rb, line 105
105:     def require_dojo_pkg
106:       begin
107:         require 'dojo-pkg'
108:       rescue LoadError => e
109:         return false
110:       end
111:       true
112:     end
require_prerequisites!() click to toggle source 
    # File installer.rb, line 62
62:     def require_prerequisites!
63:       if !require_dojo_pkg
64:         die_with_message(REQUIRE_PREREQUISITES_ERROR)
65:       end
66:       if !require_rails
67:         die_with_message(msg)
68:       end
69:     end
require_rails() click to toggle source 
     # File installer.rb, line 114
114:     def require_rails
115:       File.directory?(@rails_root) && File.exists?(File.join(@rails_root, "config", "environment.rb"))
116:     end
